content:
Though something of a lost skill to much of the Imperium,
the uncharted fringes require its use far more frequently. The
Swim Skill allows the character to swim through various
liquid mediums. Under normal conditions swimming does
not require a test. More difficult waters, unusual circumstances
or long distances call for a Skill Test. For more information
on the Swim Skill, see the Swimming section on page 207 of
Chapter VII: Playing the Game.
